subtitle: Everyone's favourite meal - and it's quick and economical to make

method.text: Put the potatoes in a pan with enough cold water to cover. Season. Bring to boil, cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 min or until tender.
Preheat grill. Grill sausages for 10-15 min until brown all over.

Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Cook the onion and bacon until golden. Remove from the pan with a draining spoon. Drain the oil and place the beans in the pan. Add the sausages, onions, bacon and mustard and heat through gently.
Drain the potatoes and mash with the milk and 100 g of the cheese.
Place the beans and sausages in a shallow ovenproof dish. Top with mashed potato and tomato slices. Sprinkle with the remaining Double Gloucester. Place under a hot grill until the cheese melts.

title: Sausage and bean supper
